oscar.name: sc3
oscar.summary: SubCluster Command and Control (SC3) - command line tool suite
oscar.description: The SubCluster Command and Control (SC3) tool suite offers a command line interface for system and user administration tasks subclusters. It replies on the C3 toolkit's existence and extends its scope to heterogeneous setups.

changelogEntry.item: Updated to latest upstream version, with tiny bugfixes.
Convert to the new OPKG API (for OPKGC)
